writeReviewDesc: Write a review about this product
changeRolePrompt: Are you sure you want to change your role to
authPrompt: You are going to be redirected to the login page. Do you want to continue?
allProdDesc: Choose from a variety of products
myFavoritesDesc: Your favorite products in one place. You can add or remove products from your favorites list. You can also view the details of each product and add them to your cart. Also if they go on sale you will be notified thorugh email.
signInDesc: Sign in to your account to be able to use all the features.
registerDesc: Create an account to be able to use all the features.
alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in now!
name: Name
reviewSubmitted: Your review has been submitted successfully.
reviewUpdated: Your review has been updated successfully.
reviewDeleted: Your review has been deleted successfully.
cartSynced: Your cart has been synced successfully.
reviewActive: You have already reviewed this product
moreThanInStock: The quantity of product is more than in stock
wantChangeEmail: If you want to change your email, please shead to your profile settings and change it there.
saveDataInfo: Save your shipping data to be able to use it in the future. You can change it in your profile settings.
changedInfo: Your information has been changed successfully.
passwordChanged: Your password has been changed successfully.
oldCantBeNew: Old password can't be the same as new password
deleteAccountDesc: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and will delete all your data.
deleteAccountSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully.
fillAllFields: Fill all fields to create a product
productDescriptionDesc: Please describe your product in 20 or more characters
productVisibilityDesc: Choose if you want your product to be visible to everyone or not. If you choose inactive, only you will be able to see it in product preview.
productSaleDesc: Choose if you want your product to be on sale or not. If you choose sale, you will need to enter a sale price.
imageDesc: Show your product in the best light. Choose a good image for your product. You can only choose a single image.
uploadInfo: JPG, JPEG, PNG or WEBP format. Max size 350KB.
specificationsDesc: Product specifications provide more information on product such as dimensions, weight, etc. You can add as many as you want. You can also edit or delete them later.
categoryDesc: Choose a category for your product. You can choose as many as you want.
prodPreviewDesc: This is how your product will look like for users.
salePriceError: Sale price must be below original price and be more than 1!
completedCantBeChanged: Completed order status can't be changed
noInventoryStatus: No products that need your attention
totalRevenueDesc: Total revenue from all your orders.
convRateDesc: Conversion rate is the percentage of visitors who make a purchase.
avgOrderValueDesc: Average order value is the average amount of money spent per order.
allOrdersDesc: All orders from all your products.
totalCustomersDesc: Total unique customers who have bought from you.
revenueChartDesc: Revenue chart shows your revenue over a period of a month
storeInfoDesc: Store information is used to display your store to the public. You can change it at any time.
storeNameDesc: Store name is used to display your store to the public.
storeDescDesc: Store description is used to display your store to the public.
storeStatusDesc: Control your store's visibility and operation status.
storeActiveDesc: When disabled, your store will not be visible to customers.
createYourStoreDesc: Create your store to be able to sell your products.
paymentSettingsDesc: Connect your Stripe account to receive payments from customers.
connStripeDesc: You need to connect your Stripe account to receive payments from customers.
stripeIdDesc: Enter your Stripe Connect account ID to receive payments directly to your Stripe account.
pleaseVerifyDesc: Please verify your email address to be able to make purchases.
cantVerify: Can't verify your email address please close this page and try again.
badToken: Bad or expired token, couldn't verify email address please close this page and try again.
verified: Email address verified successfully please close this page.
sentTo: Verification link sent to your email
connectYour: Connect your Stripe account to receive payments for
yourStoreIsReady: Your store is ready, but you won't be able to access funds until payment is set up.
deleteStoreDesc: Are you sure you want to delete your store? This action is irreversible and will delete all your data.
saleHeadingDesc: Products that are on sale. Don't miss out on the best deals.
newHeadingDesc: New products that are added to the store. Don't miss out on the latest products.
productHeadingDesc: Products that are available. Don't miss out on the best products.
ourMission: Our Mission is to Empower Commerce
isBuilding: is building the future of online marketplaces, where anyone can buy and sell with ease. We're committed to creating an ecosystem that empowers entrepreneurs and delights customers.
p1: began in 2025 with a simple idea: create a marketplace where independent sellers and connect directly, without the barriers of traditional e-commerce.
p2: What started as a small project has grown into a thriving ecosystem of creators, entrepreneurs, and shoppers who value quality, authenticity, and community. Our platform now hosts thousands of independent businesses, from artisans and craftspeople to innovative startups and established brands.
p3: Throughout our journey, we've remained committed to our founding principles: transparency fairness, and putting our community first. Every decision we make is guided by our mission to democratize commerce and empower individuals to build successful businesses online.
p4: connects millions of buyers with unique products and services they won't find anywhere els But we're just getting started—we continue to innovate and improve our platform to create even more opportunities for our community.
empDesc: We believe in giving people the tools and platform to succeed on their own terms.
transparencyDesc: We operate with honesty and openness in all our interactions with users and partners.
communityDesc: We foster connections between buyers and sellers to create a vibrant marketplace.
innovationDesc: We continuously improve our platform to meet the evolving needs of our users.
find: Find exactly what you're looking for from thousands of products across all categories
createStoreDesc: Create your store to be able to sell your products. You can create your store in a few simple steps. Admins will review your store and approve it. After that you can start selling your products.
storeNotApproved: Store is not approved by by admins yet!
waitingForApprovalDesc: Your store is waiting for approval from admins. You will be notified by email when your store is approved.
sendToken: Send reset password token to email!
forgotPassDesc: Enter your email address to reset your password. You will receive an email with a link to reset your password.
resetEmailSent: Reset password email sent to your email address. Please check your email.
passwordResetDesc: Enter your new password. You will be signed in automatically after resetting the password.
errorWithSession: Error with Stripe session, please try again
passwordConfirm: Please enter your password before proceeding
passwordResetDescAdmin: Enter users new password. User will be signed in automatically after resetting the password.
fillAllFieldsUser: Fill all fields to configure a user
adminPrivlegesDesc: Admin privileges are used to manage the platform. Admins can manage users, stores, products and orders.
whyDesc: This product has been selected as a featured item due to its exceptional quality, outstanding customer reviews, and consistent performance. Our curators personally verify all featured products.
localeInfo: Changing your language will translate the interface but not user-generated content.
changeLocaleDesc: Choose your preferred language for the platform
orderStatusCantBeChanged: Order status can't be changed beceuase user has already deleted their profile. Please contact support or the user.
orderFailedDesc: There was an error processing your order. Please try again later or contact support.
accountAlreadyExists: A stripe account already exists for this store. Please contact support if you want to change it.
